MWC.Algorithms

Class PlainProjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.Algorithms.PlainProjection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Editable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlatProjection, JMapTransformMercator, Mercator2, Mercator3

    public abstract class PlainProjection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Editable
    interface describing how to transform from earth coordinates to screen coordinates
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
